classes.description: E-sports teams participating in various tournaments.

properties.name: members
properties.description: Members or players of the team.

properties.name: gamesPlayed
properties.description: Games or titles the team competes in.

properties.name: tournamentWinsCount
properties.description: Number of tournaments the team has won.

properties.name: isActive
properties.description: Whether the team is currently active in competitions.

properties.name: nickname
properties.description: Player's in-game or popularly known nickname.

properties.name: gameSpecialization
properties.description: Main game or title the player is known for.

properties.name: yearsActive
properties.description: Number of years the player has been active.

properties.name: isRetired
properties.description: Whether the player is retired or still active.
